question: 合格する
sourceAnswer: To Pass A Test, To Pass An Exam
sourceMnemonic: The <kanji>status</kanji> <kanji>joins</kanji> together. Think of this like a bunch of status messages on Facebook, all coming together at the same time. A big government test has just finished. Everyone's status' are joining on Facebook together to say they passed, showing <vocabulary>to pass a test</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
